languages.text: "Людишко, не зли слугу почтенного гемункула. Следуй за ним, исполняй его указания, а оказавшись на арене, постарайся выжить и порадовать господ".
"Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."
languages.original_text: "Людишко, не зли слугу почтенного гемункула. Следуй за ним, исполняй его указания, а оказавшись на арене, постарайся выжить и порадовать господ".

traits.locale_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."
"Don't irk the servant of the esteemed haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."
"Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

"Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."
"Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

languages.text: 「人間どもよ、尊敬するハモンキュラスの従者を怒らせるなよ。彼に従い、言うとおりにし、闘技場に立ったなら、生き延びるよう努力し、マスターたちを楽しませてやるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

traits.locale_text: 「人間どもよ、尊敬するハモンキュラスの従者を怒らせるなよ。彼に従い、言うとおりにし、闘技場に立ったなら、生き延びるよう努力し、マスターたちを楽しませてやるんだ」

languages.text: “别招惹血伶人尊贵的仆人，小人儿。跟着他，按他说的做。既然你在竞技场里，那你就得努力活下来，取悦那些主人。”
languages.original_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

traits.locale_text: “别招惹血伶人尊贵的仆人，小人儿。跟着他，按他说的做。既然你在竞技场里，那你就得努力活下来，取悦那些主人。”

languages.text: «No irrites al sirviente del estimado Hemónculo, human{mf|o|a}. Síguele, haz lo que te diga y, una vez que te encuentres en la fosa, intenta sobrevivir y entretener a los amos».
languages.original_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

traits.locale_text: «No irrites al sirviente del estimado Hemónculo, human{mf|o|a}. Síguele, haz lo que te diga y, una vez que te encuentres en la fosa, intenta sobrevivir y entretener a los amos».

languages.text: "Ärgert den Diener des verehrten Haemonculus nicht, Menschling. Folgt ihm, tut, was er sagt, und wenn Ihr im Loch seid, versucht zu überleben und die Meister zu unterhalten."
languages.original_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

traits.locale_text: "Ärgert den Diener des verehrten Haemonculus nicht, Menschling. Folgt ihm, tut, was er sagt, und wenn Ihr im Loch seid, versucht zu überleben und die Meister zu unterhalten."

languages.text: « Ne provoquez pas le serviteur de l'honorable hémoncule, {mf|humain|humaine}. Contentez-vous de le suivre et de lui obéir, et une fois dans l'arène, essayez de survivre et de divertir les maîtres. »
languages.original_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

traits.locale_text: « Ne provoquez pas le serviteur de l'honorable hémoncule, {mf|humain|humaine}. Contentez-vous de le suivre et de lui obéir, et une fois dans l'arène, essayez de survivre et de divertir les maîtres. »

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârını canından bezdirme insancık. Onu takip et, ne derse yap. Çukura ulaştığındaysa hayatta kalmaya çalış ve efendilerimizi eğlendir."
languages.original_text: "Don't irk the servant of the esteemed Haemonculus, humanling. Follow him, do as he says, and once you find yourself in the pit, try to survive and entertain the masters."

traits.locale_text: "Saygıdeğer Haimonkulus'un hizmetkârını canından bezdirme insancık. Onu takip et, ne derse yap. Çukura ulaştığındaysa hayatta kalmaya çalış ve efendilerimizi eğlendir."
